
# Pull Request

## Description

Please include a short summary of the changes and the related issue/goal.

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style (run `npm run lint`)
- [ ] Tests added / updated (unit / e2e / accessibility)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, CHANGELOG)
- [ ] Icons / assets updated (run `node tools/generate-favicon.mjs` if logo changed)
- [ ] CI passes (lint, tests, LHCI thresholds)
- [ ] No secrets committed

## Testing steps
1. Run `npm ci && npm test` locally
2. Verify visual changes and icons

## Notes for reviewers
- Include any compatibility or rollout notes here
